groups.name: HK-AUTO
groups.f: lambda p: p.node.region == 'HK' and p.node.tag == 'IPLC' and __import__('re').search('上|深|广', p.name)

groups.name: JP-AUTO
groups.f: lambda p: p.node.region == 'JP' and p.node.tag == 'IPLC' and __import__('re').search('上|深|广', p.name)

groups.name: SG-AUTO
groups.f: lambda p: p.node.region == 'SG' and p.node.tag == 'IPLC' and __import__('re').search('上|深|广', p.name)

groups.name: US-AUTO
groups.f: lambda p: p.node.region == 'US' and p.node.tag == 'IPLC' and __import__('re').search('上|深|广', p.name)

extras.names: JP-AUTO, HK-AUTO, SG-AUTO, US-AUTO, JP-PEER, HK-PEER, SG-PEER, US-PEER, MANUAL
